content:
Below is a table of tasks and descriptions for a field construction worker. Please categorize each job into tasks that AI can perform perfectly on behalf of humans, tasks that humans can use with the help of AI, and tasks that only humans can do.

Job description
Visit a target store Visit a store site.
Check the condition of the property (original, demolished, and aging), measure and photograph the size of the interior, check windows (location, size, and whether they are open or closed), evacuation lines, electricity capacity, location of outdoor units, and additional construction (restrooms, fire, leaks, etc.). 
Check the desired location of external signage Check the exterior finish of the building, identify the location, size, and number of external signs, and explain to the center manager to discuss with the landlord.
Check external sign permit regulations Check the regulations for installing external signs in your area and building (number, size, sign type, etc.)
Identify needs for space configuration, proportion, and scope of additional construction Occupancy ratio (proportion of one- and two-person rooms), other desired spaces (lounge, warehouse, open seating, video studio, etc.), etc.
 Discussion on space configuration (studio configuration, location by space: e.g. lounge inside/window side)
 Optional construction (sound-absorbing materials, lattice windows, projector windows), additional construction (new and renovation work: ceiling, floor, demolition, electricity addition, fire protection, restroom, elevator hall, etc.)
 Whether to purchase individual equipment (initial goods: logistics, studio equipment, courier supplies, other supplies)
Internal sharing: Permit regulations, checklists, special matters Salesforce - Reporting of external company permit regulations, facility checklists, center manager's guidance and consultations
Cross-check with the supplier's actual measurements (the number of rooms differs by 1 depending on the error)
Confirm the floor plan of the supplier and check whether it is written according to the interior manual (room size, corridor width regulations, door orientation, optimal circulation, etc.), ROI check (calculate the maximum number of rooms)
 Review & revise based on facility checklist
ALT: Create a different version of the floor plan with the contractor (in parallel with the contractor)
Share internally: Report 1st floor plan Salesforce - Report 1st drawing (summarize floor plan)
Finalize floorplan > Confirm with Center Director Explain, convince, and incorporate any additional changes to the floorplan.
Share internally: Report final floor plan Salesforce - Report final drawings (summarize floor plan)
Confirm signage regulations with sign company Confirm regulations for targeted stores (number, location, sign type) 
Provide information for signage drafting Provide site photos, desired installation locations, and desired exterior sign types and numbers
Receive sign prototype > Decide on final plan > Deliver to partner Deliver sign installation location and size to center manager for reconfirmation (guide on which location is marketable - ex. Location A is a road, location B is a residential area, so we recommend A), deliver final location and number to partner
Share internally: Decide on external signage Salesforce - Report external signage decision (fill in permit regulations and branch coverage / illegal guidance)
Receive and confirm signage quotation Signage is different for each site, so a separate quote is received from the sign company each time and added to the final quote.
Request for quotation based on [final floor plan & signage estimate] Deliver final signage estimate
Review quotation & request for revision Check whether the facility checklist is reflected
 Confirmation of quantities and quantities for each process (especially for walls) / Confirmation of dimensions from the original CAD - compare with the quoted values
 Check for omissions, individual unit prices, counting, and summation
Share internally: Report first estimate Salesforce - Report first estimate (summarize the estimate)
Deliver and explain the quote (to the center manager) Check for explanations and comments on the total quote, heating and cooling efficiency, and any special features.
Share internally: Pre-contract quotation report If the center manager requests modifications to the initial quotation, reflect the modifications and report the final quotation before contracting.지금 번역하기
